Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: PRODAJA - LUKSUZNA VILA S BAZENOM - ZATON BLIZINA CENTRA! GRIJANI BAZEN! Prodajemo modernu vilu u Zatonu, u blizini trgovine i centra, a od najbliže plaže udaljena je 1km. Od centra Zadra udaljena je 15min vožnje. Vila ukupne površine od 231,41m2 izgrađena je na parceli površine od 511m2.  Neto korisna površina vile iznosi 189,35m2. Sastoji se od prizemlja i kata. U prizemlju se nalazi prostrani dnevni boravak, kuhinja i blagovaonica, kupaonica i vešeraj te dodatni WC. Kat se sastoji od 4 spavaće sobe, svaka s vlastitom kupaonicom, s izlazom na terasu. U ograđenom dvorištu vile nalazi se grijani bazen od 38m2 s protustrujnim plivanjem i slapom. Vili pripada i privatni parking s četiri parkirna mjesta u dvorištu. Objekt je kompletno klimatiziran, a u svim prostorijama je provedeno podno grijanje putem dizalice topline. U izgradnji su korišteni visokokvalitetni materijali (termoizolacija na fasadi 10 cm stiropor, za podne obloge je korištena španjolska keramika, sanitarije marke Voxort, stolarija ALU-PVC marke Feal s komarnicima i griljama..). Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Zadar FOR SALE - LUXURY VILLA WITH POOL - ZATON CLOSE TO THE CENTER! HEATED POOL! We are selling a modern villa in Zaton, near shops and the center, and just 1 km from the nearest beach. It is a 15min driving distance from the center of Zadar. The villa has a total area of 231.41 m² and is built on a plot of 511 m². The net usable area of the villa is 189.35 m². The villa consists of two levels: ground floor and first floor. On the ground floor, there is a spacious living room, kitchen, and dining area, a bathroom, laundry room, and an additional toilet. The first floor consists of 4 bedrooms, each with its own en-suite bathroom and access to a terrace. In the fenced yard, there is a heated pool of 38 m² with counter-current swimming and a waterfall. The villa also has private parking with four parking spaces in the yard. The property is fully air-conditioned, and all rooms have underfloor heating powered by a heat pump. High-quality materials were used in construction (10 cm thermal insulation on the facade, Spanish ceramic tiles for flooring, Voxort brand sanitary ware, Feal brand ALU-PVC joinery with mosquito nets and shutters, etc.). Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Zadar
